description: Detects executable access via webdav6. Can be seen in APT 29 such as from the emulated APT 29 hackathon https://github.com/OTRF/detection-hackathon-apt29/ Author: SOC Prime, Adam Swan. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Executable from Webdav
query: (event.dataset:"http" AND (user_agent.original:*WebDAV* OR url.original:*webdav*) AND (http.resp_mime_types:*dosexec* OR url.original:*.exe))
